on reading compounds: 孫子【ソンシ】Sun Tzu (Chinese military strategist, 544?-496 BCE), The Art of War (military text by Sun Tzu, 512 BC), Sun Bin Bing Fa (military text by Sun Bin)
孫子の兵法【ソンシノヘイホウ】The Art of War (military text by Sun Tzu, 512 BCE)
愛孫【アイソン】one's beloved grandchild
外孫【ガイソン】grandchild from a daughter married into another family
kun reading compounds: 孫子【まごこ】children and grandchildren, posterity, descendants
内孫【ないそん】child of one's heir
